Message:
As my mind spun into panic,
a familiar shadow crossed
right in front of me.

He stood in the middle
of the town square,
protecting as many
people as he could...

Sure enough, the creature
turned on the man.

He dodged its attack,
but only by a few inches...

All he’s been able to do is dodge,
and yet...he refuses to run.

Why’s he doing all this?
...So everyone has
a chance to escape?

But, the beast
finally cornered him,
and drew closer
for the final strike.

But...heroes don’t pick and
choose who they save!

They don’t save only
those who can be saved.

Heroes save people...
because that’s who they are!

Before my mind had
time to catch up,
my feet had already
started running.
